document_data.caption: A map showing Chrysalis in Synnoria.
document_data.name: Chrysalis
document_data.mainbody: '''Chrysalis''' was an [[elf|elven]] city located within the kingdom of [[Synnoria]] on the isle of [[Gwynneth]] on the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}
document_data.Geography: Chrysalis was secluded within a small valley found between the [[Cambro Mountains]] and [[the Highlands]] near central Gwynneth.
document_data.Description: The city was founded upon a small island in the largest of several lakes found in the valley. Chrysalis was accessible by land by two natural bridgesâ€“one in from the northeast and the other from the southwest.
